channel.title: Warning
channel.description: Lock this. I have recently been on rs-ps and a few other communities and people have been talking about servers being shut down by Jagex. They think that Jagex are on a server kill to berid of runescape private servers. Someone also said that Jagex mainly go for the servers that make money. This is just a little note by me. Stay safe.

item.title: Warning
item.dc:creator: @Trebel Trebel
item.description:
@Trebel wrote:

rs-ps dot org your talking about?? they got hacked thats it by some noobs…

Read full topic

item.title: Warning
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Most clients aren’t fully rewritten yet so we still use Jagex code. Also the protocol is also under copyright meaning that is something they could shut you down for.

Read full topic

item.title: Warning
item.dc:creator: @Trebel Trebel
item.description:
@Trebel wrote:

Jagex cant take it over, just the host, but people will always make new ips and new ips, doesnt matter jagex can try hard.

Read full topic

item.title: Warning
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

How do you think most popular servers are up? All Jagex can do is take down whoever is hosting the cache because that’s the only real illegal part. The servers and clients are all written by communities like this and they have no claim on them. Plus most server’s websites make you agree to a Terms of Use page meaning they can’t even view the site. (Don’t quote me on that last part, but that’s what I can make of the TOS 99% of servers force you to accept.

Read full topic

item.title: Warning

rep++ doesn’t seem to work…
